Package org.world.agents.enemies

Class SecurityBot

java.lang.Object
org.world.GameObject
org.world.agents.enemies.Enemy
org.world.agents.enemies.SecurityBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<GameObject>
public class SecurityBot
extends Enemy
Implements a basic test enemy that tries to reach the player and attack them

  • Constructor Details

    • SecurityBot

      public SecurityBot​(int x, int y)
      Creates a new Security Bot enemy at given x,y (isometric) coordinates. If the coordinates are invalid they are set to 1,1.

  • Method Details

    • ai

      void ai()
      Checks the distance to the player. If too far away to attack, attempt to find a path via the AI.aStar(int, int, int, int) algorithm. If close enough, initiate attack.
      Specified by:
      ai in class Enemy

    • deathBehaviour

      void deathBehaviour()
      Description copied from class: Enemy
      Implemented in subclasses. Defines what happens when this enemy's health falls below 0.
      Specified by:
      deathBehaviour in class Enemy

    • render

      public void render()
      Description copied from class: GameObject
      Renders the object when necessary, is overridden in some instances(ex. Player, Tiles) when more/different functionality is needed
      Overrides:
      render in class Enemy

    • attack

      void attack()
      Description copied from class: Enemy
      Defined in subclass. This method should handle all possible attack actions the enemy is capable of. After an attack is finished the attacking flag should be set to false to allow the enemy to execute other actions
      Specified by:
      attack in class Enemy
